author: voith
content:
Hey guys, EIP 155 has been on mainnet for a while now. But it seems like Chain ID is not a hard requirement. 
I just executed a TX without Chain ID on goerli and then replayed it on kovan. 
The spec says so too: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/1ed7b5d9bc43223637e4f4796180d67b44d82c48/src/ethereum/spurious_dragon/spec.py#L631-L639
Any idea why Chain ID hasn't been made a hard requirement?

author: samwilsn
content: I don't think there's a strong reason to _require_ chain id

author: samwilsn
content: Some things (like universal deployers) can't work if the transaction has a chain-id

author: voith
content: Thanks for the answer. I didn't know of such applications
